problem.markdown: Which of the following is true? ( ) [mathjaxinline](\frac{\partial p}{\partial s})_T=(\frac{\partial v}{\partial T})_p[/mathjaxinline] ( ) [mathjaxinline](\frac{\partial p}{\partial s})_T=-(\frac{\partial v}{\partial T})_p[/mathjaxinline] ( ) [mathjaxinline](\frac{\partial p}{\partial s})_T=(\frac{\partial T}{\partial v})_p[/mathjaxinline] (x) [mathjaxinline](\frac{\partial p}{\partial s})_T=-(\frac{\partial T}{\partial v})_p[/mathjaxinline]
problem.p: Which of the following is true?
